cause.description:
A non-profit organization, set up by Ms. Jeanne Bones, works to rescue, rehabilitate, and adopt out animals. The primary focus is on cats, but she has also rescued dogs, bunnies, horses, and other abandoned animals.
Check out the adoptable cats: http://www.petfinder.com/shelters/OH606.html
1. Rescue animals from harmful situations
2. Rehabilitate animals
3. Adopt as many animals as possible
cause.name: Happy Tails Sanctuary
